allowCommentsInJsonFiles.title: Allow Comments in .json files
allowCommentsInJsonFiles.description: When checked, will allow comment syntax in all files with the `.json` extension even though it’s not valid JSON. When unchecked, comments in `.json` files will be marked as invalid, and only files with the `.jsonc` extension will be allowed to show comments. (It’s recommended to reload your window or restart Pulsar after changing this setting.)
